45 Indiana's own state government hired a foreign worker on an H-1B visa for a "Database Administrator" job this year. posted 1 hour ago by Thatunknownguy 0 comments award share report block Andrew Ireland @AndrewIrelandIN • 5h 🚨 Indiana's own state government hired a foreign worker on an H-1B visa for a "Database Administrator" job this year. If we're serious about being America First, we cannot use tax dollars to import foreign workers
